required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: OPTImal Management of Antithrombotic Agents: OPTIMA-2 Trial
clinical_study.official_title: Intensified Antiplatelet Therapy in Post-PCI Patients With High On-treatment Platelet Reactivity: the OPTIMA-2 Trial

lead_sponsor.agency: The First Affiliated Hospital with Nanjing Medical University

collaborator.agency: National Natural Science Foundation of China

clinical_study.source: The First Affiliated Hospital with Nanjing Medical University

brief_summary.textblock: High on-treatment platelet reactivity (HOPR) is associated with increased risk of cardiovascular events in patients undergoing percutaneous coronary intervention (PCI). We sought to investigate the efficacy and safety of 1-month intensified antiplatelet therapies in post-PCI patients with HOPR.

primary_outcome.measure: the proportion of patients with persistent HOPR at 1 month
primary_outcome.description: platelet aggregation in response to 5μM adenosine diphosphate (PLADP) measured by light transmittancy aggregometer (LTA) ; HOPR was defined as PLADP > 40%.

secondary_outcome.description: a composite of MACE including cardiovascular death, nonfatal myocardial infarction (MI), ischemic stroke, target vessel revascularization (TVR), stent thrombosis (ST) and cardiac readmission during 12-month follow-up,revascularization, and stent thrombosis (ARC definition)

other_outcome.description: any bleeding defined by the Thrombolysis in Myocardial Infarction (TIMI) criteria

arm_group.description: clopidogrel 75mg once daily plus cilostazol 100mg twice daily

intervention.description: (ASA 100mg daily + Clopidogrel 150mg daily) x 1 month; (ASA 100mg daily + Clopidogrel 75mg daily) x 11 month.
(ASA 100mg daily + Clopidogrel 75mg daily + Cilostazol 150mg Bid) x 1 month; (ASA 100mg daily + Clopidogrel 75mg daily) x 11 month.
(ASA 100mg daily + Ticagrelor 90mg Bid) x 1 month; (ASA 100mg daily + Clopidogrel 75mg daily) x 11 month.

overall_official.affiliation: The First Affiliated Hospital with Nanjing Medical University

facility.name: First Affiliated Hospital of Nanjing Medical University
